document_data.name: ''Fist of the North''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Fist of the North''''' was a legendary [[enchanted]] bludgeon, used in the 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Powers: The ''Fist of the North'' possessed a potent ''+3'' enchantment that increased the weapon's damage and guided the wielder's hand to ward the targets. The [[mace]]'s magic made it deadly when used against [[orc]]s and [[ogre]]s, dealing additional damage to them in addition to being scorched by [[radiant energy]].
document_data.History: By the late 15{{th}} century DR, the ''Fist of the North'' was known to had turned the tide in many battles against orcs and ogres. The weapon was seen in many hands across the [[Neverwinter Wood]], the [[Goblin Forest]], [[the Crags]], the [[Sword Mountains]],
